title: Data Analyst Intern
description: Work on analyzing large datasets for government digital initiatives. Contribute to data-driven policy decisions and help improve digital service delivery across India.
requirements: Currently pursuing Bachelor's/Master's in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field
Knowledge of Python, R, or SQL
Understanding of data visualization tools
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

title: Policy Research Intern
description: Research and analyze policy impacts for sustainable development goals. Support in drafting policy briefs and conducting stakeholder consultations.
requirements: Pursuing Masters in Public Policy, Economics, or Social Sciences
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Research and analytical skills
Knowledge of statistical analysis software

title: Digital Marketing Intern
description: Support digital marketing campaigns for promoting entrepreneurship initiatives. Create content for social media and help organize startup events.
requirements: Pursuing degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field
Knowledge of social media platforms and digital marketing tools
Creative thinking and content creation skills
Basic knowledge of graphic design tools

title: Software Development Intern
description: Develop and maintain government web applications and digital services. Work on improving citizen-facing digital platforms and ensure robust, secure solutions.
requirements: Pursuing B.Tech/M.Tech in Computer Science or IT
Knowledge of Java, Python, or JavaScript
Understanding of web development frameworks
Familiarity with database management systems

title: Environment Research Intern
description: Conduct research on environmental policies and climate change initiatives. Support field studies and help in preparing environmental impact assessments.
requirements: Pursuing degree in Environmental Science, Biology, or related field
Interest in environmental conservation and sustainability
Field research experience preferred
Good analytical and report writing skills

title: UI/UX Design Intern
description: Design user-friendly interfaces for government digital services. Conduct user research and create wireframes and prototypes for citizen-centric applications.
requirements: Pursuing degree in Design, HCI, or related field
Portfolio demonstrating UI/UX design skills
Knowledge of design tools like Figma, Adobe XD
Understanding of user-centered design principles
